    • Method Detail

      • createTopology

        public Neuron[][] createTopology(int[] topologySchema,
                                 double alpha,
                                 double eta)
        Create topology (array of neurons) from topology schema (array of integers).
        Parameters:
        topologySchema - topology schema (array of integers)
        alpha - net momentum
        eta - learning grade
        Returns:
        array of neurons

      • createTopologySchema

        public int[] createTopologySchema(int numberOfInputs,
                                  int numberOfOutputs)
        Create topology schema (array of integers) for number of inputs and outputs It use default inner layer size, which if 4. For example for 3 inputs and 2 outputs method will create topology schema: 3 4 2
        Parameters:
        numberOfInputs - number of inputs
        numberOfOutputs - number of outputs
        Returns:
        array of integers containing each layer length
